name: Beat Box (JoeDaFarmer)
description:
Seizure warning!

A rhythm game about clicking on boxes, or do a risky combo for a big reward!

Credits-

Songs by Bensound.com

Controls-

Left click boxes on beat

Right click to combo

T to go to Title screen

Other-

If offset messes everything up, you can turn on the title screen.

Download version has less lag, so more sync.

3rd level is literally impossible.
